website_summaries.verdict: Super inexpensive, yet looks great and installs easily.
pros: Great look at a great price
Simple to install once you get it assembled
cons: The assembly can be tedious and take a bit of time
Be careful when screwing in light bulbs, as the socket isn’t very strong

website_summaries.verdict: Attractive small-space lighting for a reasonably small price. Assembling this chandelier may be a bit of a struggle, but the tradeoff in looks could be worth the sweat equity.
pros: Users liked the prettiness of this small chandelier
Extra attachment pins are included for strand assembly
cons: 40 watt maximum bulb size limits this to soft or accent lighting only
Issues with the fixture shorting out if bulb is screwed in too tightly
Assembling all the strands is tedious

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Socket for light broke after 3 days. Had to go to Home Depot's and buy two parts for about 7 dollars to fix it myself. Other than that the light looks stunning. I would advise be careful when screwing the light bulb in, when it slightly starts getting tight just stop. I barely turned it tight and it snapped
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Guest

customer_reviews.title: Beatiful light fixture!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these lights for our hall way. The quality of the fixture is very nice. They even included extra set of crystal piece. My wife and I love the way they look. Take a look at the photos.
customer_reviews.author: kursat

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These look so great for the price, I now have six in my home. Make sure you expect assembly to take a bit of time! So worth it
customer_reviews.author: CRST

customer_reviews.title: Now accepts up to 100 watt bulb.
customer_reviews.text: Quite a project to put together. However it looks fantastic once completed. Certainly looks much more expensive then it is. Mine was rated up too 100 watt E12 bulb. I know the description states 40 watt max but the fixture stated 100 watts in two places.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Hermosa - Beautifull
customer_reviews.text: Es hermosa, e ilumina excelente (es necesario comprar las bombillas especiales), es difícil de instalar porque trae muchas piezas de cristal y para ensamblar y luego que esta armada es difícil centrar la lampara a los tornillos que la sostienen del techo, pero una ves instalada es excelente! It is beautiful, and illuminates excellent (it is necessary to buy the special bulbs), it is difficult to install because it brings many pieces of glass and to assemble and then that this assembly is difficult to center the lamp to the screws that hold it from the ceiling, but once installed is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: kjpaulino

customer_reviews.title: Small but substantial
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of these to hang in an attic remodel bedroom for my daughter. She loves them. They give off nice light and make a nice star-like shape on the ceiling. The base is 7 3/4" wide and the overall height is 9" at the tallest point (not the 6" listed in the description). I was looking for something that wouldn't hang down to far from the ceiling since the ceilings are only 7 ft high. It comes with an extra strand of beads and crystal ball for replacement, should you break or lose one, along with a baggie of other replacement pieces.
customer_reviews.author: JLB

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I was on the fence about ordering these...but they look really great. I read the previous reviews so I knew that I had to do some assembly, which I did at night watching TV. Putting them up was a breeze, except that the screws provided were too skinny for my light boxes (I dug around in the garage and found some that worked). I had also read in the previous reviews to not overscrew the bulb, so I was very gentle...and wahlah, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: I bought  2 so far it is beautiful. They also added value to our home by 50%
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased my second one just like this but I put my kitchen my daughters bedroom! It was supposed to be a surprise for your birthday but I couldn’t hold it in. Even though this one only takes one ball it does give us enough light to light up an entire room. Let’s just say she is in the first grade and is excited about it so that means a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amber photogbellidance

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Elegant, not cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to find adequate lighting for our small hallway and these worked great! They are so beautiful and well made! No cheap feeling to the crystals which I love and appreciate. For those saying it takes 30mins to assemble ..I don't know how it would take that long...took me about 10mins each. Super easy install and very bright. I'm so in love with these lights. Very elegant and actually bigger than I thought they would be! Fantastic purchase! Only thing, I recommend wearing gloves to assemble and hang. Fingerprints show easily on base.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light fixture!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light fixture for my small laundry room and it looks amazing! It gives the perfect amount of light.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Daughter LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light! We placed this within our daughters room and she LOVES it! I will say this as a WARNING its tedious to put together and a pain to hang initially but relatively easy once its all put together. The only bad part is that there is NO bulb with the dang thing. How can you NOT include a bulb. Well, there reason is the bulb is NOT cheap it cost us around 7$ at our local lowes. I would advise that you get the bulb pre install. Once it's up it's gorgeous and matches her room perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: RyG

customer_reviews.title: I ordered two of the larger ones from the same company and they were perfect too with extra crystals as I described for the ...
customer_reviews.text: This company sent this light carefully packaged and real crystal as advertised. The also included an extra ball and string of crystal beads. My brother brought the same style light from a different company for 3 times the price and no extra crystal balls or bead string. One of his crystal balls was chipped and they took forever to send him a replacement. I ordered two of the larger ones from the same company and they were perfect too with extra crystals as I described for the small one. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: hilliardharris

customer_reviews.title: Shorter than previous ones I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered over five of these I loved it I was impressed so I ordered one recently to my surprise when I put it up the length is shorter than the others it not matching up with the others Hugely disappointed Wish they could send me another for free due to my distress and disappointment. Wishful thinking
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Sue

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Wow! for the price you cannot be this elegant looking chandelier. It not difficult to put together just time consuming. I put this up by myself but I would recommend two people because with all of the crystals hooked on it will be a little heavy. Its in our living room. Some say its not bright enough. Just put in a larger watt bulb. 100w max.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Lovely chandeliers
customer_reviews.text: This looks lovely in my daughters' bedroom after I redecorated it and it also looks elegant in my bedroom! I bought two! This is a small sized chandelier- which I was aware of before purchasing and it met my size expectations. It comes with a few extra (plastic) crystals to save in case you end up needing them. I installed them myself and had no issues doing so. It was my first light fixture changeout attempt and it was quick, smooth and quite painless to do.
customer_reviews.author: Doogers_Wife

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product, it so beautiful and what a great price. It take a smaller light bulb then I realized and I was worried it would not put out enough light, but it actually puts out just enough light. I was very surprised and very happy in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Sme

customer_reviews.title: For the price I can’t complain.
customer_reviews.text: Just came at noon and installed it after I got home from work. Before I can install it I had to install a recess converter for my ceiling that I also ordered from Amazon. Install wasn’t hard at all, didn’t even had to read the instruction. Now just have to see how long it last.
customer_reviews.author: mario

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The chandelier is nice & have several compliments. My only complaint it takes a while to put together. You actually have to loop things twice. Put the string & large ball together & then attach to the base. Price was excellent & looks great
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my little girls room and it is perfect!! It is very small but adorable. It is sparkly and makes a beautiful light waves on her walls making it almost appear underwater. It was early to install and came with lots of replacement parts in case any of the jewels fall off. For the price this light cant be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be fully assembled
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t installed it yet. Beware it doesn’t come Pitt together. You have to assemble all the little beads. But it’s very easy my 8 yo did it. Purchased to replace the ceiling light in her room. It’s very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: MomD of 4

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is super nice for the price. The instructions are a little wonky and you will have to kind of eyeball what goes where. It’s the size as described, nice for my little hallway. Hoping it holds up for the $20 I paid. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha A.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty! Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Pretty easy to assemble, took me about 30 minutes. It came with a few extra crystals, so I added them to half the shorter strands, giving it a more layered effect! It was heavy to put up and definitely took two people to put up! Well worth the $20!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda W

customer_reviews.title: Great for a little princess!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the "boob light" in my daughters room. For the price I wasn't expecting such quality. But the installation was very easy and it looks beautiful. The light needs a candelabra bulb, I used a 60 watt low energy bulb and it lights my daughters entire room well. It's not extremely bright, but great for a cozy bedroom or a hall space. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Yorgie

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect closet chandelier - really dresses up the closet. I think it also a good size for a low ceiling (8 foot high) entry. It was super easy to put together. I think the drop beads are glass - they are heavier than one I know is acrylic. So that is good because you can use windex to clean them. This is really a great deal & everything shipped super quick & secure
customer_reviews.author: GD

customer_reviews.title: Nice for price
customer_reviews.text: Nice look and easy to assemble. Glass bulbs are suspended and secured to the base using thin metal t-ties. The bulbs are heavy and overtime will pull the t-tie straight and fall down. I recommend using strips of duct tape to keep them from falling out/down. Overall installing is straight forward. The nuts/bolts are metric and you'll likely need 2additional bolts when installing. Puts off a good amount of light for a closet - with rainbow prism cast on the walls. Not sure if I'd use it as a primary light source in a larger space.
customer_reviews.author: TReeves

customer_reviews.title: Hard to install but beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Does require some assembly. Instructions were great... was a little hard to make it secure but it is BEAUTIFUL and for the price I can’t complain now that it’s in! Does require an E12 lightbulb that it doesn’t come with.
customer_reviews.author: carlabubs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughters bedroom and it is so cute! Not long and perfect for a smaller bedroom of a little princess. Easy assembly and installation.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Fuoss

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice for my hallways. Easy to make it together(I use small knife🔪 to open hoops and putting crystal to ring ) but it take time.Good quality for almost all. I give 4 stars because some small crystals downed and large crystals in place hanging lightly downed. Howewer it is not noticeable at all when all collected. Packing was good. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: for the girls' closets
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our girls' closets. We just had them installed in our new build and they do a good job of lighting up the area, granted it is a fairly small closet. They are excited about them and for the price it is a good value. We will see how long they last. Hanging the beads takes a little time but nothing is overly complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Super Frog

customer_reviews.title: Love this chandelier!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh! I love this thing!! We put it in my closet which isnt too big but its SO perfect in that space. The crystals were a pain to hang but I did that one by one before I screwed it to the ceiling. We removed our old school light fixture and easily put this one in. We are by NO MEANS electricians, barely DIY-ers lol, but we got it up in 30 min or so. It has one light bulb so make sure its bright. Works perfect! Absolutely no complaints :)
customer_reviews.author: suzysoextra

customer_reviews.title: I have a fancy closet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife’s closet. Thought I’d hang a chandelier up in there. It looks pretty cool. I find that an LED bulb looks better than a standard bulb but that’s just me. All in all pretty nice. And very easy to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Phillips

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I love this light, instructions say not ideal for bathroom (not waterproof) however I installed it in the bathroom away from the shower. As long as you keep the moisture low by using your fan it will keep the light dry and rust free. I didn't give this a 5 star only because of the installation, it was a bit tricky. This is not the only light I have in this bathroom, this should not be used if your only light source as the bulbs are 12e and fairly dim.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They look gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these that hang in my custom 11 ft. closet. They make me feel like a celebrity. They give plenty of light and are a great finishing touch. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: SuzL

customer_reviews.title: The Wife thinks its Beautifu, I think its not too Obtuse
customer_reviews.text: The wife wanted some real pizzaz and sparkle in our bedroom. I convinced her to go with something a little more subtle. I have to sleep there too! This is nice, the "crystals" are actual glass, and It was relatively easy to assemble. With a proper bulb, it shines nicely and is not over the top or "Trey Gawdy"
customer_reviews.author: Airsick Lowlander

customer_reviews.title: It gives some bling to an area that needs it.
customer_reviews.text: The light needs to be put together. It took me about 45 minutes and some patience. For the price it's definitely worth the time. And looks beautiful in my small bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa O.

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful as expected. It did not disappoint. I installed it ove a glassand chrome coffee table and simply love the look.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Coats

customer_reviews.title: Love this in my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Love this in my bathroom... definitely a great deal!! So easy to install, too. I did it myself (with a little help from my 10 yr old to hold it while wiring).
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Adorable bling for the closet
customer_reviews.text: Finally replaced the last ugly light fixture in our house. This inexpensive, sparkling fixture is perfect in our walk in closet. The only downside was assembly. You have to attach all the bling to the mount.
customer_reviews.author: E. Durham

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful love it
customer_reviews.text: This product I gave a 5 star because I absolutely love it. It was neatly packed easy to put together and the instructions were easy. I’m so glad I bought this light. My hallway is going to look awesome:)
customer_reviews.author: jojo

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful Chandler​! I placed it on my hallway leading to our bedrooms. The crystal have a nice clarity and sparkle so lovely even without the light on! The sparkle and Shadow that is cast's on my wall is amazing as well. The price was the best part!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Sacramento

customer_reviews.title: Reflection of light on ceiling beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these lights. Beautiful. My Freinds loves them too had me to order them some
customer_reviews.author: Shawnette

customer_reviews.title: Good price, classic beauty
customer_reviews.text: Small and delicate crystal chandelier. added a touch of class to the ceiling. I love it
customer_reviews.author: meridianwoman

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Have to put it together yourself, but it's really not hard to do so. The light is really fun and unique looking, looks great in my daughter's bedroom. For the price, totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Sparkles and rainbow colors of light. Work of art.
customer_reviews.text: Sparkles and rainbow colors galore. This is a work of art and a center piece for attention and compliments. Takes long time to put together because you have to hang each glass crystal, but it is so worth the time for sure.
customer_reviews.author: DLO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is so beautiful. I want to get more. It is very bright although only has one bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Alan T.

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Wonderful and price is amzing!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with them! I ordered 4, 2 for my entryway, 1 for hallway and 1for my closet. They were not difficult for me to put together maybe 15 minutes at most. And took my husband only a few minutes to hang them
customer_reviews.author: Mroy

customer_reviews.title: would have been beautiful..
customer_reviews.text: After finally getting this light fixture up in my daughters room it broke when screwing in the lightbulb the part that the lightbulb goes into snapped right off.... would have been beautiful...
customer_reviews.author: lex

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this, perfect addition to our nursery !
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: Love this.....takes a bit of time to string the stuff but can't wait to put it up....it looks like real crystals....when I opened the box I was impressed by the balls....they look high end. Get it if you like fancy stuff and not boring plain light fixtures....it makes a nice pattern on the wall.....I'm totally into stuff like that.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wiebe

customer_reviews.title: I love this chandelier
customer_reviews.text: I love this chandelier!! It's even nicer than I though it would be! The instructions aren't great if you've never installed a light fixture, but the longest part was hanging the crystals. Make sure to hang those first before you put the light fixture up on the ceiling or it'll be impossible. I absolutely adore the way this looks in our room and it's plenty of light!
customer_reviews.author: J. Pajon

customer_reviews.title: Shine bright like a diamond
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th time buying this mini chandelier I have it through out my hall way in the house. I loved how it looks. And very good price will buy more if I need it ahaha. A must have in your home!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL lights. I wanted sparkle and they do sparkle
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL lights. I wanted sparkle and they do sparkle. Great buy here with Amazon because at a retail store they were expensive. I actually had to return one because it din't work but ordered a replacement and it works right along with the other two. Thanks you
customer_reviews.author: MyLinh

customer_reviews.title: Crystal light fixture is pretty and easy!
customer_reviews.text: Putting the crystals on was a bit time consuming. Using a jewelers needle nose pliers was extremely helpful. The fixture looks fantastic. I installed it with a small medallion behind it to cover damage to my ceiling from an antiquated fan. I also am using a vintage style led bulb to give it a soft glow. Live this fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Barela

customer_reviews.title: Deal for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Value for the buck! Note- you do have to assemble all the glass beads! Besides that it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mindi

customer_reviews.title: and the unit is beautiful. I'm kind of klutzy with my hands so ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this high marks even though I haven't gotten the two lights installed yet. The crystals are very high quality, and the unit is beautiful. I'm kind of klutzy with my hands so will have my daughter who likes to make jewelry put the baubles on for me!
customer_reviews.author: Peg O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! Well worth the price. Everybody loves it. Doesn't put out very bright light. It takes the skinny bulbs. I need to check and see what my wattage is and maybe go higher. But a great, quality, beautiful product! So glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon H.

customer_reviews.title: So Sad!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. The electricians installed it in my new house and it doesn't work. There's something wrong where the bulb goes in.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Jackson

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's a great product. Bulb however wasn't that bright so I ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's a great product. Bulb however wasn't that bright so I had to replace it. One of them came without bulb. Looks very nice after installing.
customer_reviews.author: We Inspire Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Light
customer_reviews.text: Had fun on the ladder installed the fixture first then put on the crystals
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel M. Frank

customer_reviews.title: Super Small
customer_reviews.text: Its a beautiful fixture however it only gives off limited light, even if you use a 100 watt bulb. This is a good choice for a closet or small hallway.
customer_reviews.author: Shanese

customer_reviews.title: But it's too small for my guest room so it's size made me disappointed. This chandelier is more suitable for a bar ...
customer_reviews.text: It's such a cute little chandelier. But it's too small for my guest room so it's size made me disappointed. This chandelier is more suitable for a bar or a very small room.
customer_reviews.author: Khine

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my bathroom & everyday I look up at it I just smile!!!! Very happy!! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Laceta Jackson

customer_reviews.title: and very easy to hang
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new closet. It is way prettier than in the picture, and was not difficult for hubby to install. All of the beading is glass, and very easy to hang. The way they are put together allows for changing the length,if desired. It came with an extra crystal strand and an extra ball. It did not come with light bulb though, which is not a big deal. I think the value for the price is great. Honestly, it is much nicer than I expected
customer_reviews.author: LoriO

customer_reviews.title: Add a bit of pizzazz!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light. It adds a little pizzazz to my hallway. Easy to assemble and install.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca E.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous! You have to put it together, but it's gorgeous. I cannot believe how cheap this was, because the quality is amzing. It sparkles through my whole kitchen. Really stunning. It does not give off tons of light, but I have another light so it goes perfect!! Can't say enough about this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: High quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Real crystals. Amazing sparkle and not too difficult to assemble. Well worth the low price.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Instructions were hard to follow
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are so difficult to understand. Plus, I needed more support than what came standard in my ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Twalea A Randolph

customer_reviews.title: There has to be a better design that they could have selected for this task
customer_reviews.text: I would give 5-stars if this fixture was easier to assemble. It took me almost 45 minutes to attach the 21 stringers to the round wires. (long finger nails are a must have). Then they have to be attached to the top base by the same wires. There has to be a better design that they could have selected for this task. Other than going through this ordeal, the unit is very attractive and we are pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Eubank

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly as pictured and looks great in my half bath - adds character and sparkle ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly as pictured and looks great in my half bath - adds character and sparkle to the otherwise dull bathroom. I didn't install it but it looked like a easy job for a light- install veteran. The crystals took some time to put up.
customer_reviews.author: LAUREN

customer_reviews.title: would recommend !
customer_reviews.text: So pretty! It took me a while to decipher the directions. it's very vague so I have to figure out where to put each price. Even though it took a while, I would still recommend because it's an elegant looking price for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: AZN

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous sparkle!
customer_reviews.text: I love this light! I replaced an old fixture with this beauty and it looks absolutely fabulous in my hallway. I'll probably buy two more for my smaller bedrooms. It was very easy to assemble and hang.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Kellis

customer_reviews.title: it's perfect. Solid mounting bracket
customer_reviews.text: Some assembly required - outstanding product for the money, it's perfect. Solid mounting bracket, sturdy design. The E12 bulb is the same as B11 in the U.S. - FYI ...
customer_reviews.author: Mike Harris

customer_reviews.title: These light fixtures are amazing. We absolutely love them
customer_reviews.text: These light fixtures are amazing. We absolutely love them, they're elegant, they're easy to install (you do have to assemble the crystals and should use a bird-beak pliers to make that easy), they're magnificent and really elevate an ordinary room to something so much more. No buyer's remorse here!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa T

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & sparkly
customer_reviews.text: Prettier in person, easy to install although you have to hook not assemble, the beads to the light base. Great for the price & sufficient enough light for a closet. Liked it so much I'm going to order another for the powder room. I did paint the base a bronze to match my other fixtures
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my granddaughters bedroom. The size and description are right. She loves it. Posted pics of her new room and everyone commented on this light !
customer_reviews.author: nana5xs

customer_reviews.title: So pretty perfect for a bedroom!
customer_reviews.text: So pretty, my girls loved it for their bedroom. It has plenty of light and the special bulb was easy to find. My 10 and 12 year old put it together in about 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Affordable chandelier!
customer_reviews.text: The shipping took over 3 weeks because it was shipped from China but it was all worth it! The chandelier received looked like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: LILLY CHEN

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chandelier!!
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice! I still need to put it up. But so far looks great assembled! Shiny , sturdy and elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazongirl

customer_reviews.title: Bling
customer_reviews.text: Very Beautiful hanging in my bedroom give my room a lot of personality very good lighting and I’m a woman who love my bling.. just don’t like putting it together but very Beautiful!! I would recommend to anyone one
customer_reviews.author: misty jones

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't horrible to put together. It wasn't horrible to install either. I, single mom, actually installed it by myself. For the price I highly recommend it! My 7 yr old daughter loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy S.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty, attaching the stringers took me about 30 min
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, attaching the stringers took me about 30 min, but worth it, the large bottom crystals were the hardest. Definitely attach stringers completely before install.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Pictures don't do this justice. I bought two. Simple to assemble and install. Came with extra piece too. They look beautiful in my hallway. Perfect size too.
customer_reviews.author: Karleen Shimchim

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this light fixture
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this light fixture. just as pictured in this listing. Really pretty in my bathroom. For the price, you can't beat it. Very very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mel S

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was even more beautiful in person and once it was installed, it was incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Soursdey Soler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lighting! The large crystals to attach on the ...
customer_reviews.text: The chandelier is able to utilize 100 watts but I chose to use a 40 watt bulb in my walk in closet. Perfect lighting! The large crystals to attach on the bottom took some really good hand/eye coordination looping the ring through the hole; overall putting all the crystals together took about 45 minutes. It was worth it. I want another for my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: JayJan N

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chandelier, great seller!
customer_reviews.text: When we first order this chandelier it wouldn't turn on after installing it to three different outlets. We figured it was something to do with the hardwiring. We contacted the seller and they sent us a new one. We installed it last night and it's just what we needed. This chandelier is gorgeous! The seller is fantastic and is easy to deal with. We are very happy with their purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ritchiebaby

customer_reviews.title: Mini Chandelier
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful mini chandelier. It helps to put the crystal strands on first so you won't be working over your head after the fixture is in place. I actually bought 2. One is in the hall and one in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great Bling
customer_reviews.text: Love the little bit of bling in my small bathroom. It's the first thing everyone notices.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre Layzell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Dont Think Twice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and more beautiful than any pictures. You will not regret this fixture. It can dress up any room in your home.
customer_reviews.author: MatRixWon

customer_reviews.title: Lights up well
customer_reviews.text: So amazing, always get compliments and it lights up my entire room! I have a big room!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yota

customer_reviews.title: Looks Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Bought 8 so they match. Use common bulb inexpensive to replace.
customer_reviews.author: SimbaTCat

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this small lighting fixture. It is so elegant and a bit understated. Fabulous find!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Jones

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy installation
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived within 2 days with prime shipping. Packaged very carefully. It took me 30 minutes to install the item which includes putting the beads together. It was very simple and beautiful. I used it to update my walk in closet.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: but beautiful and for a Great price
customer_reviews.text: Very low lighting, but beautiful and for a Great price!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Looks so elegant and I love that it's only 1 light. I use an led night light bulb that uses less than 1 watt. I won't have to worry if my Airbnb guests leave it on.
customer_reviews.author: Pogiboi

customer_reviews.title: This thing is so bright and pretty that I want them all over my house
customer_reviews.text: Sparkle, Sparkle, Sparkle! This thing is so bright and pretty that I want them all over my house :-)
customer_reviews.author: amtexas

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty, great price
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous. Price point can't be beat. Assembly is a bit of a pain in the tush, but it comes with spare parts.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Riggins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this very expensive looking lamp ..such a great quality and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is beautiful! It only took about an hour to assemble and put up and I have never done any electrical work before-(learned how on YouTube) for $30 it was a total steal!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Gilly

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Pain to assemble
customer_reviews.text: No instructions on assembly. Looks good but a lot to assemble. Okay for the price but some instructions on what the pins are for etc would be good.
customer_reviews.author: sheetub
